attributes.action: Come down hard on BT so that they do not introduce a charge for people who do not pay by direct debit, as many low earners and pensioners will suffer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Telecom are planning to charge their customers for not using the Direct Debit system.  This goes against fairness for all and will especially hit pensioners who do not have or do not want a back account.  If a pensioner is a 'low user' any charge BT make will wipe that out. So come on BT play fair and leave things alone.
